column5: Anybody in the East end of the GTA have a Skidoo CDI sitting on the spare parts shelf?  Denso.. 0700002421  Please PM Fishhunter  Thanks!
does it have to be from the same model of as long as the numbers match? http://cgi.ebay.com/ebaymotors/1997-SKI-DOO-FORMULA-Z-583-CDI-BOX-070000-2421-/180617017730

My buddy Paul Martel runs Bent Toys here in the North Bay area. I will vouch for him. He can have it purrolated same day. www.btsp.ca (705) 663-1366
